body_html:
@yaroslavvb

Here are the reports from System Report: (About This Mac > System Report > Graphics )

So - does this support CUDA or does it not? I 'm at a loss to figure this out now.

body:
@yaroslavvb 

Here are the reports from System Report:  _(About This Mac > System Report > Graphics )_

So - _does this support CUDA or does it not? I 'm at a loss to figure this out now._ 

